panel.label: Style
panel.panel_help:
Choose the overall design for your wood panel. Each style combines a panel shape with a waveform pattern.

FILTERING: Use the filter icons to narrow by shape (circle, rectangle, diamond) or pattern (radial, linear).

SELECTING: Click any card to preview it. Hover to see the name and description.

wood_species.label: Wood & Grain
wood_species.panel_help:
Select wood species and grain direction for your panel.

CHOOSING WOOD: Click a species card to select it. Thumbnails below show grain direction options.

MULTI-PANEL DESIGNS: Use the section buttons above to apply different woods to each section. Click "All" to apply the same wood everywhere.

layout.label: Layout
layout.panel_help:
Adjust the physical dimensions and detail level of your artwork.

CONTROLS:
• Size – overall scale of your piece
• Elements – number of waveform bars (more = finer detail)
• Separation – spacing between sections

Drag any slider to adjust. Changes preview in real-time.

NOTE: Some options may be limited by your chosen style.

backing.label: Backing
backing.panel_help:
Add an optional backing material behind your panel for depth and contrast.

CHOOSE MATERIAL: When enabled, scroll through color options. Materials include acrylic and painted finishes. Click any swatch to preview.

frames.label: Frames & Shelves
frames.panel_help:

rooms.label: Room Settings
rooms.panel_help:
Preview your panel in realistic room environments.

SELECTING: Click any room thumbnail to place your artwork in that scene. Each environment includes appropriate lighting and wall positioning.

paint.label: Wall Finish
paint.panel_help:
Choose a wall color to see how your panel contrasts against different backgrounds.

COLORS: Organized by tone (warm, cool, neutral). Scroll horizontally to browse.

SELECTING: Click any swatch to apply. The preview updates immediately.

tour.label: Take the Tour
tour.panel_help:
Watch a 60-second guided tour showing how WaveDesigner transforms audio into custom wood art.

• Click the "Enjoy the Tour" button to begin
• The tour auto-advances through key features
• Click "Skip Tour" in the corner to exit anytime

collections.label: View Our Collections
collections.panel_help:
Browse our curated collection of hymns, scripture, prayers, and original works.

FILTERING: Use the category buttons (Hymns, Scripture, Prayers, Original, Artists) to filter what's shown.

BROWSING: Scroll left/right through cards using the < > arrows or drag. Click any card to select it.

VARIANTS: Some tracks have multiple artist recordings. When available, artist chips appear below the cards—click to switch versions.

slicing.label: Optional Audio Tuning
slicing.panel_help:
Focus on a specific part of your audio—like a chorus—to change how your waveform art looks.

WAVEFORM: The shaded area shows your selection. Drag the green handle (start) or red handle (end) to adjust.

PLAYBACK:
• [◀◀ 5s] Skip back 5 seconds
• [5s ▶▶] Skip forward 5 seconds
• [▶] Play or pause

MARKING:
• "Start Here" – marks where selection begins
• "End Here" – marks where selection ends
• "Reset" – clears selection, uses full track

VOCAL ISOLATION: Toggle the switch to remove background music and keep only vocals. Processing takes a few moments.
